WorkPlace.Name: NoHo, Nordic Hospitality Partners DK A/S

HiringOrg.Name: NoHo, Nordic Hospitality Partners DK A/S

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
BARTENDERS & WAITERS 

If you love cocktails and burgers, and creating amazing experiences then the Cocks & Cows is the place of work for you.

As the original burger kings and queens of Copenhagen, we are seeking new kitchen staff to join our units all around Copenhagen and in Lyngby

We are building our team from a combination of existing members from other Cocks & Cows units, and new hires. We are looking for Bartenders and Waiters.

It’s all about the right attitude and we will offer full training, homing in on your skills and knowledge to ensure you are able to offer the best possible experience for our guests and your colleagues.

Do you
  • Wish to create lasting memories for people
  • Have a positive energy and a solution orientated mentality
  • Have great team work skills, and an ability to multi task
You will work amongst a team of passionate people who love hospitality and strive for the same goal – to ensure all our guests have a fabulous time with us, receive great food and service.

The responsibilities
  • Welcoming our guests and ensuring they have the best time
  • Taking and running food and drink orders
  • Clearing tables
  • Mixing cocktails and making drinks
  • Taking payments
  • Assisting in the cleaning and tidying of the Restaurant.
  • Maintain the highest levels of personal hygiene and appearance.
  • Follow the law in respect of food hygiene and health and safety

We are offering
  • Full time or part time position starting as soon as possible
  • Working hours include evenings, weekends and public holidays
  • A friendly, fun enjoyable, unique working environment
  • Social events throughout the year
  • 30% staff discount  for  you   and up to 3  friends at our restaurants and other concepts under  the NoHo  Partners Denmark Umbrella
We love to promote from within in all areas of our business, therefore the opportunities to grow and develop within Cocks & Cows, or other NoHo  Partners DK concepts is high if that is what you are seeking.  part, then we've got a career path for you - we'd love to be the last company you ever work for!

Please apply by sending a CV and Cover Letter for this role. 
Applications are ongoing and will be reviewed on a regular basis.
